  1. Your Government

  5. How do I...

What's New

  1. Campbell Businesses Recognized By Metro Magazine's Best of Silicon Valley List 2019!

    Campbell's unique restaurants and retailers are among those recognized as the best in the South Bay by Metro Magazine in its annual Best of Silicon Valley list for 2019! Read on...

  2. Public Hearing for District Elections

    The City Council will hold a Public Hearing on Tuesday, April 2, at 7:30 p.m. to conduct a second meeting to receive public comment concerning how the City Council electoral districts should be drawn and criteria to be used to establish the districts. Read on...

  3. 2020 Census Participation and Job Opportunities

    Every 10 years, the U.S. Census Bureau undertakes the massive task of counting every person living in the United States. Outside of voting, participating in the census is one of the most powerful things you can do for your community. Read on...

  4. Great American Litter Pickup April 27, 2019

    The City of Campbell will be hosting our Annual Great American Litter Pickup on Saturday, April 27, 2019 from 9:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. at Campbell Park. Registration starts at 8:30 a.m. Read on...

  5. Consideration to transition to City Council Districts

    Consideration to transition to City Council Districts, due to a recent demand letter alleging that the Current At-Large Method of Election Violates the California Voting Rights Act, was presented to City Council with their options on January 15, 2019. Read on...
View All
